EmailTemplate.subject: NCS Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Grad Reps,
The time has come to put your networking and communication skills to the test.
Your Coventry Youth Board has organised a fantastic event to raise awareness for the realities of being homeless!
It will be a fantastic opportunity to re-connect with people from you wave over a great cause as you put your empathy to the test by experiencing what its like to sleep rough for a night. There will be interactive games/sessions, hot drinks/biscuits and some camp fire entertainment and of course some cheesy NCS staff holding down the fort.
You can pitch this event however you like - be creative, or just copy and paste the eventbrite link, its up to you but this is your opportunity to spread the word among your wave so please send it to everyone you're still in contact with from NCS.
https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/coventrys-big-sleepout-tickets-21716791508
Big Love
NCS
